title: Mezza - Halifax Shopping Center
typeOfFood: Lacto, Mediterranean, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Lebanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quick service franchise eatery (in the food court) offering Lebanese-Middle Eastern food. Vegans could get a falafel wrap and a Lebanese plate with hummus, tabouleh salad, grape leaves, lentils, rice, and pita.
